string.value: |Fushigina kotoda… konseki mitaida… hitobito ga kowagaru no mo murihanai, watashi mo kokode wa anshin dekinai. Kono genshoo wa Middogarudo ni hookoku shi ni itta hoo ga iidesu ne.
TOOZOKU|Soo... Anata wa koko de yukue fumeideshita...
RISA|Anata? Koko de nani o shite iru no? Anata wa subete o dainashi ni shimashita... Maa, tsumari... Subarashii kaihoo o arigatoo.
|Watashi wa anata o sukutta, Risa. Saa, anata wa watashi no shitsumon ni kotaete kurerudeshou. Watashi wa dare ga watashinochichi o koroshita no ka shiritai nodesu!
RISA|Nani? Dare? Watashi wa soreto wa nani no kankei mo arimasen. Watashi wa dare mo koroshimasendeshita! Sore ni, nureta keesu o watashi ni oshitsukeru nante kangaenaide kudasai!
|Watashi wa anata o sememasen. Sukunakutomo subete no shoosai ga akiraka ni naru made wa.
RISA|Sore de, naze koko made watashi o foroo shita nodesu ka?

|Koko de shitsumon shitemasu! Kotaete kudasai, Guruhoi mura no juumin o koroshita no wa daredesu ka? Dare ga kono zangyaku kooi o okashita nodeshou ka? Watashitachi ga wakareta toki ni anata wa soko ni ikimashita, soshite sokode nani ga okotta ka shitte imasu!
RISA|Tsumari... Hai, watashi wa sore ga okotta toki soko ni ite, dare ga sore o shita ka o mimashita.
|Koe o agete!

RISA|Karera wa atarashii sekai chitsujo no tame no senshi-tachideshita. Hiiro no Yoake - sore ga karera no nada. Nishi kara kita reikokuna satsujin-sha-tachi. Karera wa tsuujoo, kokugai ni wa ryokoo shimasenga, ima dewa kinrin chiiki ni shinshutsu shi hajimete imasu.
|Dooshite karera ni tsuite son'nani kuwashii nodesu ka?
RISA|Watashi wa atarashii hoohoo, atarashii tekunorojii o sagashite sekaijuu o hinpan ni tabi shite imasu. Doko e itte mo.
|Shikashi, naze karera ga tsumi no nai hitobito o koroshita no ka, watashiniha mada rikai dekimasen?

RISA|Kore wa ippantekina senjutsudesu. Karera wa suu-kai no kishuu o okonaudarou. Soshite, hitobito no ma de panikku ga hajimaru to, karera wa arawarete hogo o mooshidemasu. Toozen, muryoode wa arimasen.
|Nan to iu hiretsu-sa! Karera ga watashi no sokoku ni kegareta ashi o nobasu koto wa yurushimasen! Zen'in koroshiteyaru!
RISA|Koofun shinaide kudasai. Korera no sanzoku no nakaniha, kazoku o ue kara sukuu tame ni hooshi ni itta hito mo imasu. Kyooyoo sa re tari kyoohaku sa re tari shita hito mo imasu.

RISA|Jissai, hontooni sekinin ga aru no wa riidaa no Akuseru dakedesu. Aku no teikoku zentai wa kare no tetsu no ishi ni motodzuite imasu. Sore o haijo sureba, kyoodaina chikara wa sajoo no rookaku no yoo ni kuzuresaru.
|Soodesu, meirei shita hito ga kotaerubekidesu. Akuseru ga makeru!
RISA|Kare ni chikadzuku no wa hijoo ni muzukashii koto o shitte kudasai. Soshite, chikarazukude wa naku, kookatsu ni koodoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
|Watashi ga yaremasu. Tada nishi e no michi o yubisashite kudasai.
RISA|Watashi ga shitte iru yuiitsu no michi wa, yama no chika o tooru ton'nerudesu. Asugarudo de kare no koto o tazunete kudasai. Saraba, eiyuu!
|Sayoonara. Tasukete kurete arigatoo.
SUPIIKAA|Tatakai ga hajimarimasu!
SUPIIKAA|Tatakai o hajimemashou!
|Katta! Rafutingu aru yo!
Kyaraban wa hakai sa reru. Anata wa kare no anzen o kakuho dekimasendeshita.
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
Kono michi ga doko ni tsudzuite iru no ka wakaranainode, koko ni tomarimasu.
Nani ka kimyoona basho. Koko kara hanareta hoo ga ii yo.
